weloveclouds.server.requests.kvecs.utils

Class StorageUnitsTransporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • weloveclouds.server.requests.kvecs.utils.StorageUnitsTransporter

  • public class StorageUnitsTransporter
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class which helps with transferring MovableStorageUnit instances to a remote destination.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  StorageUnitsTransporter.Builder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void transferStorageUnits(java.util.Set<MovableStorageUnit> storageUnitsToTransferred)
      Transfers the respective MovableStorageUnit instances respecting the limitation set by NUMBER_OF_STORAGE_UNITS_TO_BE_TRANSFERRED_AT_ONCE to the destination denoted by connectionInfo.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • StorageUnitsTransporter

    • Method Detail

      • transferStorageUnits

        public void transferStorageUnits(java.util.Set<MovableStorageUnit> storageUnitsToTransferred)
                          throws UnableToConnectException,
                                 UnableToSendContentToServerException
        Transfers the respective MovableStorageUnit instances respecting the limitation set by NUMBER_OF_STORAGE_UNITS_TO_BE_TRANSFERRED_AT_ONCE to the destination denoted by connectionInfo.
        Parameters:
        storageUnitsToTransferred - storage units that have to be transferred to the remote destination.
        Throws:
        UnableToConnectException - if the connectionInfo is not contactable
        UnableToSendContentToServerException - if any error occurs during the transfer
